review_data.title: HIDDEN GEM
review_data.content: This was our nightcap go-to bar on our weekend in Zurich, we stumbled upon it by chance on the way back to our hotel on the first night. Cosy little place and seats were always guaranteed. It was lovely to chill for half an hour...More

review_data.title: Ein kleines aber umso heimeligeres Lokal für einen ...
review_data.content: ... für einen Kaffee oder einen Absacker im kleinen Rahmen. Einige feine Mahlzeiten, aber keine eigentliche Küche wie in einem...More

review_data.title: Cozy, little cafe at Altstadt Hotel
review_data.content: As it had been more than one year since my last visit, it was a good excuse to stop by for a quick visit. This little café has a nice, relaxed atmosphere. I had to settle for a hot tea (5.80CHF), as they still do...More

review_data.title: Kaffeepause in gemütlicher Atmosphäre
review_data.content: Wir haben das Bistro zweimal zum leckeren kaffeestop genutzt und konnten diesen an den kleinen Tischen vor dem Lokal geniessen....More

review_data.title: A wonderful memory made on a sidewalk
review_data.content: As my friends and I wandered up the narrow gray-cobblestone streets of the Altstadt heading towards the Grossmunster, we came across some small tables set out on the edge of one narrow, historic street. They turned out to be in front of the Hotel Altstadt's...More

review_data.title: Nice, yet somewhat hidden bar in the Old Town
review_data.content: The Altstadt Bar is a small, compact and cozy little bar that is part of the Hotel Altstadt. The place serves as a reception for the hotel as well as a full service bar, though I don't understand the restaurant designation. They have a few...More

review_data.title: Gepflegtes kleines Hotel.
review_data.content: Ein liebevoll gestaltetes Hotel in der Stadtmitte, das durch einen gepflegten Stil und freundliches Personal besticht.

review_data.title: Drink after dinner
review_data.content: This tiny little bar (restaurant?!?) adjacent to the hotel is a comfy little place to come to and have something to drink. It functions as a bar with snack at the same time being the hotels reception. We liked the place due to its charm,...More

review_data.title: A nice small bar also suitable for ladies traveling on their own!
review_data.content: If you are staying at the Altstadt Hotel and do not want to go out in the evening, you might want to have a bite at the Altstadt Bar. A small, intimate bar which serves soups and sandwiches, fresh ginger tea with honey/lemon and also...More

review_data.title: Great coffee, ambiance, and service!
review_data.content: We had an evening coffee and desert at the hotel restaurant and were pleasantly surprised. The food and coffee were great, but even better was the delightful server, Bernadette, who made us feel welcomed and special. I would highly recommend stopping here!

review_data.title: Spontaner Espresso
review_data.content: Kurzerhand haben wir uns für einen spontanen Espresso im Café Altstadt entschieden. Service war sehr freundlich. Das Brownie zum Espresso...More

review_data.title: Good coffee, service OK
review_data.content: We came during an afternoon for some coffee and snacks. The place was half full, service was OK but not too friendly. Coffees have been very strong - a bit too strong for our taste.

review_data.title: Something about the Bar of the Altstadt Hotel
review_data.content: It is easy to overlook the Bar of this Boutique Hotel: Being the Ultimate Pedestrian I am dependent on strategically located "watering holes" in the towns I choose to stay for a prolonged amount of time. The Bar of the Altstadt Hotel is one of...More
